post:
The Doc has been in the lab again conocting cheap and cheerful plans.

We are pleased to be able to offer a free Direct Admin Licences with any of our VPS plans over £5/m in any of our available locations. 
A licence can also be purchased if your VPS plan is under £5. We charge £5/m per licence.

These are promotional offers and are non refundable. Please make use of our Looking Glass for a test IP and file.
